unnormalised: Hey everyone! Thinking of trying Ayurveda myself. Heard good things about the treatments at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. My friend Priya went last year, around Diwali, and said it really helped with her stress. Planning a Panchakarma for 10 days, starting around 26/01/2024. Anyone else tried it? Any specific recommendations? Is 16:30 hrs a good time for Abhyanga? What about expenses, roughly in Rs.? Let me know your experiences! Thinking of going from Delhi, it's about 1900 km, I guess.
normalised: Hey everyone! Thinking of trying Ayurveda myself. Heard good things about the treatments at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala.
